text: Karim City College, Jamshedpur, established in 1961, is one of the oldest degree college in the Jharkhand state of India with a view to impart education to the weaker section of Jamshedpur specially Muslims. It offers undergraduate and postgraduate courses in arts, commerce and sciences. It is a Muslim minority institution under Karim's Trust and permanently affiliated to Kolhan University, Chaibasa. It is a Muslim college where Urdu teaching staffs are given preference over others. == See also == * Karim City College Mango Campus *Education in India *Literacy in India *List of institutions of higher education in Jharkhand ==References== ==External links== * Category:Colleges affiliated to Kolhan University Category:Educational institutions established in 1961 Category:Universities and colleges in Jharkhand Category:Education in Jamshedpur
title: Karim City College, Jamshedpur
